definition: to set aside/to make provision for (capital requirements)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: Custodian fee of fund is set aside every day and paid every month.
sentences.chinese: 基金託管費每日計提，按月支付。

sentences.english: Accruals for depreciation are a function of an accounting convention and do not necessarily reflect the market.
sentences.chinese: 計提折舊的會計慣例的功能，並不一定反映市場。
